verbose_text: We were able to link this increase in N-cadherin expression to in vivo cell proliferation because when we produced vascular injury in N-cadherin fl/fl; iCre mice expressing a tamoxifen inducible SMC specific Cre, we found that induction of N-cadherin (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), neointimal formation (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), and cell proliferation (XREF_FIG) were all reduced.
